name: Jeevan Kumar
tagline: Full stack web developer, youtuber & mentor
bio: Software Engineer with 5 years of experience in applied AI, full-stack development, and building scalable web and mobile applications. Skilled in modern front-end frameworks like React and Next.js, back-end technologies such as Node.js and Python, and integrating AI models to create intelligent tools. Currently working at Buildship, focused on developing AI-powered no-code workflows and innovative solutions. Passionate about building user-friendly apps that solve real problems while continuously learning and growing as a developer.

seo.title: Jeevan Kumar - Full stack web developer, youtuber & mentor
seo.description: Full-Stack Web Developer based in India with more than 3 years of experience and worked for 3+ early-stage companies.

homePage.githubComment: // find the code of this portfolio at

experience.description: Building AI-powered tools and workflows for the Buildship no-code platform.
Developed a horse-racing dashboard, ATA technology website, and an AI chatbot solution dashboard. Utilized technologies: CMS, React, JavaScript, Next.js, Tailwind.

Implemented SSR, One-Click Launch feature, and built a webform builder from scratch. Awarded "Hero of the Month" for outstanding contributions. Utilized technologies: Canvas, TypeScript, React, GraphQL, Next.js.
Developed the frontend of a trade-in application for refurbished smartphones. Utilized technologies: Python, Django, Web Scraping, Material UI, GraphQL, Next.js, Tailwind, React Js.
Built a second-hand mobile phone price comparison website from scratch. Utilized technologies: Python, Django, Web Scraping, React Js.

education.description: Part of the Computer Science and Engineering department, where I learned various programming languages, frameworks, algorithms, and data structures.
